summary:
This mod adds cover music from Malukah:
Age of Oppression
Dragonborn Comes
Tale of Tongues
descriptionHtml:
===========
IMPORTANT
===========
I had to reupload the mod, previous package was corruped :( This time it works like a charm. Sorry for the inconvinience.
===========

This mod adds (just adds, no replacements) cover music from Malukah and two other artists. Music can be heard while in wilderness, taverns and sometimes in the cities.

Malukah - The Dragonborn Comes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g

Malukah - Age of Oppression:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzHXt6n1QhM

Malukah - Tale of Tongues:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjEpw4O-WNI

ViolinTay - Morrowind/Skyrim Medley:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cAnQQcIncq0

Also boss combat music:

Sbeast - Sons of Skyrim:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyCFuP3rM2w

This is my first mod ever, so bugs may appear, but worked fine for me. If you will like this I can put more cover songs, but be aware that only WAV files are supported, so filesize might be huge.
author: Wynarator
